name: Emberwood (Beta)
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through the mystical realm of Viridar. Play as the agile Sentinel or the mighty Dragon Knight, both equipped with their own unique skills and abilities. Discover awe-inspiring landscapes, while fighting against an array of monstrous foes and nefarious bandits. Gain allies and develop your combat skills while traversing the war-torn path of the warrior-king.
